title: Crescent Bakery and Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Take-out, Bakery, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Family-operated bakery and cafe offering baked goods, soups, sandwiches, and a full espresso bar.  Vegan could get panini, daily vegan soup, breads, desserts, and milk alternative. Owned by a husband and wife team and the wife is a vegan.
